synopsis.text: Search for the shapes where light dances through minerals and natural stones held up to the sunlight, and the silhouettes created by the shadows. Witness the journey of a small spot as it gradually discovers its own unique form. This captivating and visually stunning animation is the Graduate Work 2017 of Rina Okada from the Tokyo University of the Arts, Graduate School of Film and New Media, Department of Animation. The anime invites viewers to appreciate the beauty of light and shadow, and the process of self-discovery.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
